reviewText:
Tom Avery doesn't over-complicate things, nor does he oversimplify them. You can't wait to apply what you've learned!

I have the whole 8 DVD series of his called, "Consistent Tennis Wins".

These DVDs deal with the:
Serve
Return of Serve
Backhand
Ability to Swing
Net Play
Singles & Doubles Tips
Specialty Shots (lobs, slice, etc) and the
Original

It costs more than others, because you get what you pay for!
